entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon then snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming southwest 20 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
